parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description:
The name of the database.    
You cannot use reserved keywords, such as test and mysql.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page returned.  
- Start value: 1   
- Default value: 1

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of rows returned on each page.  
- Maximum value: 100.  
- Default value: 10

parameters.name: WithTables
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the information of tables in the database.   
Default value: false.
